title: (x) "Saving the nation" script - Adage Script {Lay, Florian}
tags: Need help identifying new script font
content:
Any ideas what this script font is? Any help is greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newscript_3991.jpg)
author: billegoat

comments.content: [Adage Script JF](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015315/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000002) by Jason Walcott is a better version.
